|brand = Cisco |model = Meraki MX60 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = 09/21/2020â€Ž |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.wi-cat.ru/Meraki_MX60 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = router |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = 7016A0512008 |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Applied Micro;APM82181; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = PowerPC |cpu1_type_rev = 464 |cpu1spd = 800 <!-- 1.0 GHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = NAND |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Spansion;S34ML08G101TF100; |flash1size = 1 GiB |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 512 |ram1chip = Nanya;NT5TU128M8GE-AC; |ram1_num = 4 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |sw1chip = Atheros;AR8327; |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 1GbE |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 00:18:0A
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;2009.08;; |stockos = Linux;3.4.109;;
|exp_if_types = USB 2.0, |exp_usb_num = 1 |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 1.5 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = 5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner = 2.5 |pwr_barrel_len = 9.5 |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, 4-pin header,, populated,, 3.3V TTL,, (115200 8N1), |jtag = yes,, 16-pin header,, unpopulated,, J1
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = metal case, |addchip = 2A Bus Termination Regulator;Fitipower;FP6137E;;1;,,, 2A Dual Output Non-Synchronous Buck Converter;TI;TPS54286;;1;,,, 5A Buck Regulator;Alpha & Omega Semiconductor;AOZ1094AI;;1;,,, 16V/4A 500kHz Synchronous Step-Down Converter;MPS;MP8708EN;;1;,,, Low Voltage Hex Inverter w/ 5V Tolerant Schmitt Trigger Inputs;Fairchild;74LCX14;;1; |802dot11_protocols = none
|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = device serial number |defaultpass = "none" |manuf = Senao |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = OpenWrt
|availability = Discontinued |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = 12/2012 |estprice = 495 |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B00ANCNG56 |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = Taiwan
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "7016A0512008 Ver: 1.00" is silkscreened on the board. :OEM: [[Senao]] (see also [[Meraki MX60W]])
==Links of Interest== *[https://documentation.meraki.com/MX/Installation_Guides/MX_End_of_Sale/MX60_(EOS)_Installation_Guide Install Guide] *[https://wiki.openwrt.org/toh/meraki/mx60 ''Meraki MX60W'' on '''OpenWrt''' wiki]
